patthana16.65:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.65:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana16.65:1.1_2: anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasārammaṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.65:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
